dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4054 IH: Trauma Support and Mental Health in Schools Reauthorization Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Budzinski (for herself and Mrs. Steel) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the SUPPORT for Patients and Communities Act to reauthorize grants to improve trauma support services and mental health care for children and youth in educational settings.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Trauma Support and Mental Health in Schools Reauthorization Act of 2023.

section.header: Grants to improve trauma support services and mental health care for children and youth in educational settings
section.text: Section 7134(l) of the SUPPORT for Patients and Communities Act (42 U.S.C. 280hâ€“7(l)) is amended by striking fiscal years 2019 through 2023 and inserting fiscal years 2024 through 2028.
